text: Anwar Ali Khokhar is a Pakistani philanthropist and barber who founded Khidmat-i-Masoom Welfare Trust. The trust helps abandoned, missing, homeless children and elderly people. He was born in 1942 in Qamber Shadadkot, Larkana. In 2003, he was awarded the Tamgha-i-Imtiaz for his services. ==References== Category:Living people Category:1942 births Category:Pakistani philanthropists Category:Barbers Category:People from Larkana District Category:Recipients of Tamgha-e-Imtiaz
title: Anwar Khokhar
